description_for_human: Free crypto news API - real-time aggregator for Bitcoin, Ethereum, DeFi, Solana & altcoins. No API key required. RSS/Atom feeds, JSON REST API, historical archive with market context, embeddable widgets, ChatGPT plugin, Claude MCP server, SDKs (Python, TypeScript, Go, React, PHP). AI/LLM ready. Vibe coding friendly. Open source.
